title: Extension program helps producers improve their operations

tasks.task: Visit to Sturgeon Creek Farm and other farms to discuss agricultural improvements
subtasks: Explaining the family history and continuity of Sturgeon Creek Farm
Describing the current cow-calf operation and farm management philosophy
Highlighting goals for forage improvement and rotational grazing
Mentioning collaboration with Ag Extension agent David Coffey
Introducing Happy Hollow Farm and owner Bob Hornsby's adoption of conservation practices
Detailing Hornsby's plan to reduce cow numbers and rely more on pasture
Discussing the impact of soil testing and management changes
